metadata.titleEn: Cretaceous rock body data set of Dabie orogenic belt
metadata.titleCn: 大别造山带白垩纪岩体数据集
metadata.description: The data include the stable isotope data of elements and metals of a series of Cretaceous rocks in the Dabie orogenic belt, as well as a small number of hand specimen photos and micrographs. X-ray fluorescence spectrometry (XRF) was used to test the major elements with an accuracy of less than 2%, inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS) was used to test the trace elements with an accuracy of less than 5%, and multi-channel inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (MC-ICPMS) was used to test the stable isotopes of Ca, Mg and Fe with an accuracy of more than 0.06 ‰. The above tests were completed from May 14, 2016 to June 19, 2020, The data have been published in many international well-known petrological journals, such as geochimica et cosmochimica Acta, chemical geology, etc. These data are of great significance for understanding the fractionation behavior of metal stable isotopes in magmatic rock systems.
metadata.descriptionCn: 数据包含大别造山带一系列白垩纪岩体的元素、金属稳定同位素数据以及少量手标本照片、显微照片。主量元素采用X射线荧光光谱法（XRF）测试，精度在2%以内，微量元素采用电感耦合等离子体质谱（ICP-MS）测试，精度在5%以内，Ca、Mg、Fe金属稳定同位素采用多道电感耦合等离子体质谱（MC-ICPMS）测试，精度普遍优于0.06‰，上述测试于2016-05-14 至 2020-06-19期间完成，数据已发表在多个国际知名岩石学杂志如《Geochimica et Cosmochimica Acta 》、《Chemical Geology》等，这些数据对理解岩浆岩体系中的金属稳定同位素分馏行为具有重要意义。
metadata.instructions:
The file named elements, isotope data and image annotation are stored in Excel file, and the hand specimen photos and micrographs are all in JPEG format.
Data reading mode: Excel file can be opened by Excel software in office software. JPEG format image file can be opened with the image software of windows.
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件命名元素、同位素数据以及图片注释以excel文件存储，手标本照片、显微照片均为jpeg格式图片文件。
数据读取方式：excel文件可以用office办公软件中的excel软件打开。jpeg格式图片文件可以用windows自带的图片软件打开。

literatureList.referenceEn: Wang, Y., He, Y.S., Wu, H.J., Zhu, C.W., Huang, S.C., Huang, J. (2019). Calcium isotope fractionation during crustal melting and magma differentiation: granitoid and mineral-pair perspectives. Geochimica et Cosmochimica Acta, 259, 37-52.

literatureList.titleEn: Iron isotopic compositions of adakitic and non-adakitic granitic magmas: Magma compositional control and subtle residual garnet effect

Iron isotopic compositions of adakitic and non-adakitic granitic magmas: magma compositional control and subtle residual garnet effect. background: Iron (Fe) isotope fractionation could occur during crustal melting, which may contribute to the isotopic variations of granites. Our current knowledge on Fe isotope fractionation during crustal melting remains rare. High silica (e.g., SiO2 N 71 wt%) granitic rocks have a highly variable δ56Fe from−0.04‰ to 0.46‰, which has been previously explained by isotope fractionation due to fluid exsolution, fractional crystallization, crustal melting, source heterogeneity and/or diffusion. Migmatites are a mixture of metamorphic rock and igneous rock. They form via incipient partial melting in pre-existing gneisses, which is often induced by the breakdown of hydrous minerals (e.g., biotite) or influx of fluid. Produced partial melts that are siliceous and hence not able to escape re-crystallize to form the igneous part of migmatites, which are generally quartz and feldspar rich and thus light-colored and called leucosomes. The residual part of migmatites are usually rich in dark-colored amphibole and biotite and called the melanosomes.
research objective: This study reports high precision Fe isotopic data for a suite of well-characterized migmatites from the Dabie orogen, central China. With a purpose to constrain isotope fractionation during crustal anatexis, Fe isotopic data are reported for 23 migmatite samples from the Dabie orogen, Central China.
challenges: Our knowledge about Fe isotope fractionation that may occur during crustal partial melting remains rare, mainly due to the difficulty in reconstructing the source property and parental magma compositions for felsic igneous rocks, if considering the complexity of Fe isotope fractionation behavior during processes, e.g., fractional crystallization, after melt extraction.
methods: Iron isotopic analyses were conducted in the Isotope Geochemistry Lab, China University of Geosciences Beijing. About 2.42 –38.39 mg sample powders containing about 100 μg Fe were dissolved by concentrated HF\\HNO3\\HCl\\HClO4. Fe was then purified with AG1X-8 (200–400mesh chloride form, Bio-Rad, USA) resin in a HCl medium. The purified Fe was then measured on a Neptune Plus MC-ICPMS by standard-sample-bracketing, and Fe isotopic data are reported in traditional δ values relative to IRMM-014.
dataset: Migmatites used in this study are from the Dabie orogen, a Triassic collision zone between the South China Block and the North China Block. Thirteen leucosomes, 9 melanosomes, and 1 amphibolitic schollen from 11 Dabie migmatites were measured in this study.
findings: The leucosomes yield δ56Fe higher than their coexisting melanosomes by 0 ~ 0.36‰. After screening out the samples that may be affected by fluid influx and exsolution, fractional crystallization, mineral accumulation, and capture of peritectic amphibole based on Th/U, FeOt/Al2O3, and Mg#, 7 leucosome-melanosome pairs yield consistent Δ56FeL-M with an average of 0.093 ± 0.056‰ (2SD, N = 7). The leucosomes measured here have Fe3+/ΣFe ratios comparable to their coexisting menalosomes. Fe isotope fractionation during crustal anatexis revealed here thus is not dominantly controlled by distribution of Fe3+ and Fe2+ between the melts and their residua. Instead, it can be explained by the difference in Fe-O bonding conditions between the granitic melts and their residual mafic minerals.
backgroundCn: 铁（Fe）同位素分馏可能在地壳熔融过程中发生，这可能会导致花岗岩的同位素变化。目前我们对地壳熔融过程中铁同位素分馏的知识仍然很少。高硅（例如，SiO2 > 71 wt%）的花岗岩岩石具有高度可变的δ56Fe值，从−0.04‰到0.46‰，这之前已被解释为由于流体逸出、分馏结晶、地壳熔融、源异质性和/或扩散引起的同位素分馏。混合岩是变质岩和火成岩的混合物。它们通过在先存的片麻岩中发生初始部分熔融而形成，这通常是由于含水矿物（例如，黑云母）的分解或流体的涌入所诱导。产生的部分熔体富含硅，因此无法逃逸，重新结晶形成混合岩的火成部分，这部分通常富含石英和长石，因此颜色较浅，称为白色部分（leucosomes）。混合岩的残余部分通常富含深色的角闪石和黑云母，称为黑色部分（melanosomes）。
research objectiveCn: 本研究报告了来自中国中部大别山造山带的一组特征明确的变质岩的高精度铁同位素数据。为了限制地壳熔融过程中的同位素分馏，报告了来自大别山造山带的23个变质岩样品的铁同位素数据。
challengesCn: 我们对在地壳部分熔融过程中可能发生的铁同位素分馏的知识仍然很少，这主要是由于在考虑到熔体提取后，铁同位素分馏行为在诸如分馏结晶等过程中的复杂性时，重建长英质火成岩的源特性和母岩浆成分的困难。
methodsCn: 铁同位素分析在中国地质大学（北京）同位素地球化学实验室进行。约2.42 – 38.39毫克的样品粉末中含有约100微克的铁，使用浓盐酸、硝酸、氢氟酸和过氯酸进行溶解。然后在盐酸介质中使用AG1X-8（200–400目氯化物形式，Bio-Rad，美国）树脂对铁进行纯化。纯化后的铁在Neptune Plus MC-ICPMS上通过标准-样品-夹心法进行测量，铁同位素数据以相对于IRMM-014的传统δ值报告。
datasetCn: 本研究中使用的混合岩来自大别山造山带，这是南中国块和北中国块之间的三叠纪碰撞带。研究中测量了来自11个大别山混合岩的13个白色岩层、9个黑色岩层和1个角闪岩块。
findingsCn: 白色岩石的δ56Fe值比其共生的黑色岩石高0 ~ 0.36‰。在筛选出可能受到流体流入、析出、矿物积累和基性角闪石捕获影响的样本后，基于Th/U、FeOt/Al2O3和Mg#，7对白色岩石-黑色岩石的样本显示出一致的Δ56FeL-M，平均值为0.093 ± 0.056‰（2SD，N = 7）。这里测得的白色岩石的Fe3+/ΣFe比率与其共生的黑色岩石相当。因此，揭示的地壳熔融过程中的铁同位素分馏并不是主要受熔体与其残留物之间Fe3+和Fe2+分布的控制。相反，这可以通过花岗岩熔体与其残留的镁铁矿物之间的Fe-O键合条件的差异来解释。

background: Significant iron (Fe) isotope fractionation (e.g., d56Fe > 0.5 ‰, ten times larger than the analytical uncertainty) has been observed in terrestrial igneous rocks (e.g., Weyer and Ionov, 2007; Teng et al., 2008; Dauphas et al., 2009a; Williams and Bizimis, 2014; He et al., 2015b ). It remains unclear to what extent these variations reflect magma processes or source composition (e.g., oxidation state, mineralogy, and compositions) (e.g., Dauphas et al., 2014; Williams and Bizimis, 2014; Zambardi et al., 2014; Foden et al., 2015; Zhu et al., 2015a ); in particular, whether Fe isotopes can help reveal redox conditions of planetary and igneous processes (Dauphas et al., 2014; Williams and Bizimis, 2014) or whether additional factors, such as coordination environment, play a significant role (Sossi and O’Neill, 2017). Fe has two oxidation states (ferrous Fe2+ and ferric Fe3+) in terrestrial silicate phases. The mean force constant of Fe3+ bearing bonds is higher than that of Fe2+ bearing bonds in silicate glasses, which predicts an enrichment of heavy isotopes in the former and highlights the potential of Fe isotopes as a tracer of magma redox conditions (Dauphas et al., 2014). However, predicted isotope fractionation induced by the distribution of Fe3+ and Fe2+ during partial melting of mantle peridotite can only account for one-third of the observed difference between middle ocean ridge basalts (MORB) and the upper mantle (/C24 0.1‰ on d56Fe; Teng et al., 2013; Dauphas et al., 2014). In addition to the distribution of Fe3+ and Fe2+, the difference in the coordination environment of Fe is a complementary but independent mechanism of Fe isotope fractionation (Sossi and O’Neill, 2017). Among Fe2+-enriched silicate minerals, garnet with Fe2+ in VIII-coordination has a Fe isotopic composition substantially lower than coexisting olivine and pyroxenes, in which Fe2+ is mainly in VI-coordination (e.g., D56Fegarnet-cpx in eclogites down to /C0 0.42‰ and on average /C24/C0 0.26‰; Beard and Johnson, 2004; Williams et al., 2009). Accordingly, Fe isotope fractionation during partial melting might be also controlled by source mineralogy. Partial melting of garnet-rich sources (e.g., pyroxenite and recycled eclogite) may produce Fe isotope fractionation larger than peridotite melting and contribute to the high d56Fe end-member of ocean island basalts (Williams and Bizimis, 2014; Sossi and O’Neill, 2017). However, the relative importance of redox and coordination environment is complicated by source heterogeneity and Fe isotope fractionation during magma differentiation (Teng et al., 2008; Williams and Bizimis, 2014; Foden et al., 2015; Sossi and O’Neill, 2017). Observations serving as evidence to constrain to what extent source mineralogy can affect Fe isotope fractionation during partial melting, however, remain scarce. Adakitic rocks may help to provide these constraints, as they are derived by partial melting of eclogitic rocks with variably abundant residual garnet (Defant and Drummond, 1990; Rapp and Watson, 1995; He et al., 2011), and thus may provide a test on the role of source mineralogy in fractionating Fe isotopes during partial melting processes.
research objective: In this study, we present the first Fe isotopic data for adakitic rocks, including 15 LMA and 22 HMA samples from the Dabie orogen (Central China) and Panama/Costa Rica (Central America), to constrain the source mineralogy effect on Fe isotope fractionation during partial melting. Thirteen non-adakitic granitoid samples from the Dabie orogen, with SiO2 spanning from 56 to 77 wt.%, are also measured to better understand Fe isotope fractionation during differentiation of intermediate and felsic magmas and to constrain the extent of magma compositional control.
methods: Iron isotope analyses were conducted at the Isotope Geochemistry Laboratory, China University of Geosciences, Beijing. The chemistry procedures are largely after Dauphas et al. (2009b) and detailed in He et al. (2015a). Approximately 5–20 mg whole rock powders were dissolved in Teflon beakers in a mixture of HF-HNO3-HClO4, and then refluxed with aqua regia (HCl: HNO3 = 3:1) and excess HNO3 aqua regia (HCl: HNO3 = 2:1) successively at 130 /C176C. The solutions were subsequently evaporated to dryness at 100 /C176C. Finally, residues were dissolved in 6 N HCl for chromatographic purification. Iron was separated from matrix elements and potential isobars with AG1X-8 resin (200–400 mesh) in a HCl medium. Whole procedure blank is 610 ng and can be considered negligible, considering P100 lg sample Fe was processed. Isotopic ratios were analyzed by the sample-standard bracketing method using a Thermo-Finnigan Neptune Plus MC-ICPMS on high resolution modes. The isotopic measurement sequence was repeated nine times for each sample Fe solution to get better accuracy, and the data are reported in the traditional d values relative to IRMM-014 (diFe = [(iFe/54Fe)sample/(iFe/54-Fe)IRMM-014 /C0 1] /C2 1000, where i can be 56 or 57). Two standard errors of the mean are reported after Dauphas et al. (2009b) and He et al. (2015a), with consideration of those arising both from chemical procedures and from the MC-ICPMS measurement. Based on totally > 300 duplicate measurements on 23 geological standards with different matrices, the long-term external reproducibility and accuracy on d56Fe are estimated to be better than ±0.03 ‰ (2SD) (He et al., 2015a).
dataset: The samples investigated in this study include 39 Early Cretaceous granitoids from the Dabie orogen, Central China (Fig. S1) and 11 adakites and 1 basaltic oceanic crust sample from Costa Rica and Panama, Central America (Fig. S2).
findings: I-type Dabie non-adakitic granitoids yield d56Fe ranging from /C0 0.015‰ to 0.184 ‰. One A-type granite sample from the Dabie orogen has d56Fe as high as 0.447 ‰, which cannot be explained by the same fractional crystallization trends defined by I-type samples but requires higher integrated D56Femelt-crystal. Except for one sample that may have been significantly changed by fractional crystallization, d56Fe of Dabie LMA varies from 0.114 ‰ to 0.234 ‰ and increases with increasing (Dy/Yb) N. High-Mg adakites from the Dabie orogen and Central America both have homogeneous Fe isotopic compositions with a mean d56Fe /C24 0.10‰.
backgroundCn: 在陆地火成岩中观察到显著的铁（Fe）同位素分馏（例如，d56Fe > 0.5 ‰，是分析不确定性的十倍）（例如，Weyer和Ionov，2007；Teng等，2008；Dauphas等，2009a；Williams和Bizimis，2014；He等，2015b）。目前尚不清楚这些变化在多大程度上反映了岩浆过程或源组成（例如，氧化态、矿物学和成分）（例如，Dauphas等，2014；Williams和Bizimis，2014；Zambardi等，2014；Foden等，2015；Zhu等，2015a）；特别是，Fe同位素是否可以帮助揭示行星和火成过程的氧化还原条件（Dauphas等，2014；Williams和Bizimis，2014），或者其他因素（如配位环境）是否发挥了重要作用（Sossi和O’Neill，2017）。在陆地硅酸盐相中，Fe有两种氧化态（亚铁Fe2+和铁Fe3+）。在含Fe3+的键中，平均力常数高于含Fe2+的键，这预测了重同位素在前者中的富集，并突显了Fe同位素作为岩浆氧化还原条件示踪剂的潜力（Dauphas等，2014）。然而，由于Fe3+和Fe2+在部分熔融地幔橄榄岩中的分布引起的同位素分馏只能解释中洋脊玄武岩（MORB）和上地幔之间观察到的差异的三分之一（/C24 0.1‰在d56Fe上；Teng等，2013；Dauphas等，2014）。除了Fe3+和Fe2+的分布外，Fe的配位环境差异是Fe同位素分馏的一个互补但独立的机制（Sossi和O’Neill，2017）。在富含Fe2+的硅酸盐矿物中，八配位的石榴石中Fe2+的同位素组成明显低于共存的橄榄石和辉石，其中Fe2+主要是六配位的（例如，eclogites中D56Fegarnet-cpx低至/C0 0.42‰，平均/C24/C0 0.26‰；Beard和Johnson，2004；Williams等，2009）。因此，部分熔融过程中Fe同位素分馏可能也受到源矿物学的控制。富含石榴石的源（例如，辉石岩和回收的榴辉岩）的部分熔融可能产生比橄榄岩熔融更大的Fe同位素分馏，并有助于海岛玄武岩的高d56Fe端元（Williams和Bizimis，2014；Sossi和O’Neill，2017）。然而，氧化还原和配位环境的相对重要性因源异质性和岩浆分异过程中的Fe同位素分馏而变得复杂（Teng等，2008；Williams和Bizimis，2014；Foden等，2015；Sossi和O’Neill，2017）。然而，作为证据来限制源矿物学在部分熔融过程中对Fe同位素分馏的影响程度的观察仍然稀缺。阿达基岩可能有助于提供这些限制，因为它们是通过部分熔融含有不同量残余石榴石的榴辉岩而形成的（Defant和Drummond，1990；Rapp和Watson，1995；He等，2011），因此可能为测试源矿物学在部分熔融过程中分馏Fe同位素的作用提供依据。
research objectiveCn: 在本研究中，我们首次提供了来自达比造山带（中国中部）和巴拿马/哥斯达黎加（中美洲）的15个低镁安山岩（LMA）和22个高镁安山岩（HMA）样品的铁同位素数据，以约束源矿物对部分熔融过程中铁同位素分馏的影响。此外，我们还测量了来自达比造山带的13个非安山岩花岗岩样品，SiO2含量范围为56%至77%，以更好地理解中间和长英质岩浆在分化过程中的铁同位素分馏，并约束岩浆成分控制的程度。
methodsCn: 铁同位素分析在中国地质大学（北京）同位素地球化学实验室进行。化学程序主要参考Dauphas等（2009b），并在He等（2015a）中详细描述。约5-20毫克的全岩粉末在特氟龙烧杯中用HF-HNO3-HClO4混合液溶解，然后在130°C下依次用王水（HCl: HNO3 = 3:1）和过量的HNO3王水（HCl: HNO3 = 2:1）回流。溶液随后在100°C下蒸发至干。最后，残留物在6 N HCl中溶解以进行色谱纯化。铁与基体元素及潜在同位素的分离使用AG1X-8树脂（200-400目）在HCl介质中进行。整个程序的空白为610 ng，可以认为是微不足道的，因为处理了超过100微克的样品铁。通过样品-标准夹心法，使用Thermo-Finnigan Neptune Plus MC-ICPMS在高分辨率模式下分析同位素比率。每个样品铁溶液的同位素测量序列重复九次，以获得更好的准确性，数据以传统的δ值相对于IRMM-014报告（δiFe = [(iFe/54Fe)样品/(iFe/54Fe)IRMM-014 - 1] × 1000，其中i可以是56或57）。根据Dauphas等（2009b）和He等（2015a）的研究，报告了两个标准误差的均值，考虑了化学程序和MC-ICPMS测量中产生的误差。基于对23种不同基质的地质标准进行的超过300次重复测量，δ56Fe的长期外部重现性和准确性估计优于±0.03 ‰（2SD）（He等，2015a）。
datasetCn: 本研究调查的样本包括来自中国中部大别山造山带的39个早白垩纪花岗岩（图S1），以及来自中美洲哥斯达黎加和巴拿马的11个阿达基岩和1个玄武岩海洋地壳样本（图S2）。
findingsCn: Dabie非岛弧花岗岩的d56Fe值范围从0.015‰到0.184‰。来自Dabie造山带的一种A型花岗岩样品的d56Fe值高达0.447‰，这无法通过I型样品定义的同样分馏结晶趋势来解释，而需要更高的综合D56Femelt-crystal。除了一个可能因分馏结晶而发生显著变化的样品外，Dabie LMA的d56Fe值范围从0.114‰到0.234‰，并随着(Dy/Yb)N的增加而增加。来自Dabie造山带和中美洲的高镁阿达基岩具有均匀的铁同位素组成，平均d56Fe值约为0.10‰。

background: Garnet that has a distinctly light Mg isotopic composition compared to other maﬁc minerals is commonly present in deep crustal and mantle sources. These LMA are known for derivation from maﬁc sources leaving eclogitic residua with variable abundance of garnet.
research objective: In order to investigate Mg isotope fractionation during partial melting of garnet-bearing sources, we report Mg isotopic data of 17 well-characterized low-Mg adakitic rocks (LMA) from the Dabie orogen, central China.
challenges: Whether partial melting of these garnet-bearing sources can lead to significant Mg isotope fractionation or not remains poorly understood.
methods: Mg isotopic analyses were performed at the Isotope Geochemistry Laboratory of China University of Geosciences, Beijing, following procedures previously published. Approximately 2–10 mg sample powders containing about 20μgMg were dissolved using a 3:1 mixture of concentrated HF-HNO3. The dissolved samples were evaporated and then refluxed by a concentrated HCl-HNO3 mixture (3:1) and concentrated HNO3 stepwisely. Samples were dissolved in 1N HNO3 prior to the column chemistry. Magnesium was purified using the ion exchange resin AG50W-X8 (Bio-Rad 200–400 mesh) in a 1N HNO3 medium following the procedure outlined in Teng et al. (2007) and Ke et al. (2016). The same column procedure was processed twice to obtain a pure Mg solution. Magnesium isotopic ratios were measured on a Neptune Plus MC-ICP-MS in a low mass resolution mode by standard-sample bracketing. The standard-sample sequence was repeated 4 times for each sample.
dataset: Seventeen Dabie LMA were selected for Mg isotopic analysis, locating in Liangshan, Shangcheng, Lidian, Datong, Egongbao, Yunfengding and Zhangbang plutons. These LMA are relatively fresh and mainly have granular textures with medium-coarse minerals. Rock-forming minerals consist of quartz, K-feldspar, plagioclase, biotite and hornblende, except for those from Liangshan. The Liangshan samples have no hornblende, and biotite as the dominant Mg carrier has suffered sericitization and chloritization.
findings: Fresh Dabie LMA display nearly homogeneous Mg isotopic compositions, with an average δ26Mg of−0.22 ± 0.08‰ (2SD, N = 18), comparable to local mafic basement. The lack of correlation between δ26Mg and (Dy/Yb) N indicates an unresolvable residual garnet effect on Mg isotope fractionation during partial melting of thickened lower continental crust. Modelling suggests that Mg isotope fractionation factor between the melt and clinopyroxene (Δ26Mgmelt-cpx) is limited to be around −0.02‰. Compared to highly variable δ26Mg (−5.57‰ to +0.92‰) of supracrustal materials, isotope fractionation during partial melting of basaltic sources is either insignificant (< 0.14‰) in a thickened crust scenario or can be easily erased by melt-mantle interaction in a slab melting scenario. In this regard, Mg isotopes can serve as a powerful tracer of recycled supracrustal materials.
backgroundCn: 具有明显轻镁同位素组成的石榴石通常存在于深地壳和地幔源中。这些低镁铝（LMA）以其源自基性岩石而闻名，留下了具有不同石榴石丰度的榴辉岩残留物。
research objectiveCn: 为了研究在含石榴石源区部分熔融过程中镁同位素的分馏，我们报告了来自中国中部大别山的17个特征明确的低镁阿达基岩（LMA）的镁同位素数据。
challengesCn: 这些含石榴石的源区的部分熔融是否会导致显著的镁同位素分馏仍然不太清楚。
methodsCn: 镁同位素分析在中国地质大学（北京）同位素地球化学实验室进行，遵循之前发布的程序。约2–10毫克的样品粉末中含有约20微克镁，使用3:1的浓盐酸-硝酸混合液进行溶解。溶解后的样品被蒸发，然后用浓盐酸-硝酸混合液（3:1）和浓硝酸逐步回流。样品在进行柱化学之前溶解在1N硝酸中。镁通过在1N硝酸介质中使用离子交换树脂AG50W-X8（Bio-Rad 200–400目）进行纯化，遵循Teng等（2007）和Ke等（2016）中概述的程序。相同的柱程序重复处理两次，以获得纯净的镁溶液。镁同位素比率在低质量分辨率模式下通过标准-样品夹带法在Neptune Plus MC-ICP-MS上测量。每个样品的标准-样品序列重复4次。
datasetCn: 选择了十七个大别山地方性微量元素（LMA）进行镁同位素分析，分布在凉山、商城、李店、大同、鹅公堡、云峰顶和张榜岩体。这些LMA相对新鲜，主要具有颗粒状纹理，矿物粒度中等至粗。岩石形成矿物包括石英、钾长石、斜长石、黑云母和角闪石，除了来自凉山的样品。凉山样品没有角闪石，黑云母作为主要的镁载体经历了白云母化和绿泥石化。
findingsCn: 新鲜的 Dabie LMA 显示出几乎均匀的镁同位素组成，平均 δ26Mg 为 −0.22 ± 0.08‰（2SD，N = 18），与当地的基性基底相当。δ26Mg 与 (Dy/Yb) N 之间缺乏相关性，表明在厚化的下地壳部分熔融过程中，镁同位素分馏的残余石榴石效应无法解决。模型计算表明，熔体与辉石之间的镁同位素分馏因子（Δ26Mgmelt-cpx）限制在约 −0.02‰。与变异范围较大的 δ26Mg（−5.57‰ 到 +0.92‰）的表壳材料相比，在厚化地壳情境下，基性源的部分熔融过程中同位素分馏要么微不足道（< 0.14‰），要么在板块熔融情境中可以很容易被熔体-地幔相互作用所抹去。在这方面，镁同位素可以作为回收表壳材料的强有力示踪剂。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the precision of the X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy (XRF) method used for measuring major elements within 2%?
Verification.QuestionCn: X射线荧光光谱法（XRF）用于测量主要元素的精度是否在2%以内？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: What is the main challenge in understanding Fe isotope fractionation during crustal melting: source heterogeneity, difficulty reconstructing parental magma composition, or the complexity of Fe isotope behavior?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 理解地壳熔融过程中铁同位素分馏的主要挑战是什么：源异质性、重建母岩浆成分的困难，还是铁同位素行为的复杂性？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are the samples for isotopic analysis in the Dabie orogen collected from?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在大别山造山带中，样品用于同位素分析的采集地点在哪里？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: Liangshan, Shangcheng, Lidian, Datong, Egongbao, Yunfengding, Zhangbang plutons
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 凉山、商城、李店、大同、峨公堡、云峰顶、张榜岩体

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with reconstructing source properties for felsic igneous rocks during isotopic studies?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在同位素研究中，重建酸性火成岩的源特征面临哪些挑战？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to analyze metal stable isotope data for Cretaceous rock bodies in orogenic belts?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于分析造山带中白垩纪岩体金属稳定同位素数据的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used to analyze metal stable isotope data for Cretaceous rock bodies in orogenic belts involves the use of Multi-Collector Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometry (MC-ICPMS) for obtaining high precision measurements of metal stable isotopes such as Ca, Mg, and Fe, with accuracy typically better than 0.06‰.
Example.AnswerCn: 用于分析造山带中白垩纪岩体金属稳定同位素数据的数据收集方法的一个例子是使用多收集器电感耦合等离子体质谱法（MC-ICPMS），以获得金属稳定同位素（如钙、镁和铁）的高精度测量，准确度通常优于0.06‰。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in understanding iron isotope fractionation during crustal partial melting of felsic igneous rocks?
Example.QuestionCn: 在理解富硅火成岩的地壳部分熔融过程中铁同位素分馏所面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge in understanding iron isotope fractionation during crustal partial melting of felsic igneous rocks is the difficulty in reconstructing the source properties and parental magma compositions, considering the complexity of fractionation behavior during processes like fractional crystallization and melt extraction.
Example.AnswerCn: 理解在酸性火成岩的地壳部分熔融过程中铁同位素分馏的一个挑战是，考虑到在如分馏结晶和熔体提取等过程中分馏行为的复杂性，重建源特性和母岩浆成分变得困难。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of data collection methods used to measure metal stable isotopes in geological samples?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于测量地质样品中金属稳定同位素的数据收集方法的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: precision within 2%, precision within 5%, precision generally better than 0.06‰
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 精度在2%以内，精度在5%以内，精度通常优于0.06‰。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many samples were analyzed for Fe isotopic data in the migmatite dataset from the Dabie orogen?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在大别山造山带的混合岩数据集中，分析了多少个样本的铁同位素数据？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the total number of Early Cretaceous granitoid samples analyzed for Fe isotopic composition from the Dabie orogen and Central America?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 从大别山和中美洲分析的早白垩纪花岗岩样品的铁同位素组成的总数是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many Dabie LMA samples were selected for Mg isotopic analysis?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 有多少个 Dabie LMA 样本被选用于镁同位素分析？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of using X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy (XRF) in the context of elemental analysis in geological datasets?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在地质数据集的元素分析中，使用X射线荧光光谱法（XRF）的重要性是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy (XRF) is used for testing major elements with a precision of within 2%. It provides important data that help in understanding the composition of geological samples, such as those from the Dabie orogen, which are crucial for analyzing metal stable isotope fractionation in magmatic systems.
Definition.AnswerCn: X射线荧光光谱（XRF）用于测试主要元素，精度在2%以内。它提供的重要数据有助于理解地质样品的成分，例如来自大别山造山带的样品，这对于分析岩浆系统中的金属稳定同位素分馏至关重要。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (MC-ICPMS)' mean in relation to isotope analysis?
Definition.QuestionCn: 多接收器电感耦合等离子体质谱仪（MC-ICPMS）在同位素分析中是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (MC-ICPMS) is a technique used to measure metal stable isotopes, such as Ca, Mg, and Fe, with a precision generally better than 0.06‰. This method is essential for obtaining high precision isotopic data, which are used to investigate isotope fractionation during geological processes like crustal melting and partial melting.
Definition.AnswerCn: 多收集器感应耦合等离子体质谱（MC-ICPMS）是一种用于测量金属稳定同位素（如钙、镁和铁）的技术，其精度通常优于0.06‰。该方法对于获取高精度同位素数据至关重要，这些数据用于研究地质过程中的同位素分馏，如地壳熔融和部分熔融。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the precision of Fe isotopic data collection using MC-ICPMS compare to Mg isotopic data collection methods in terms of reproducibility and accuracy?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用MC-ICPMS收集Fe同位素数据的精度与Mg同位素数据收集方法在重现性和准确性方面相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both Fe and Mg isotopic data are collected using MC-ICPMS, with Fe isotopic analysis reporting a long-term external reproducibility and accuracy better than ±0.03 ‰ (2SD), while Mg isotopic analysis reports an average δ26Mg of −0.22 ± 0.08‰ (2SD). Both methods emphasize high precision but may differ in their specific procedural details and isotope fractionation considerations.
Comparison.AnswerCn: Fe和Mg同位素数据是使用多接收电感耦合等离子体质谱（MC-ICPMS）收集的，Fe同位素分析报告的长期外部重现性和准确度优于±0.03 ‰（2SD），而Mg同位素分析报告的平均δ26Mg为−0.22 ± 0.08‰（2SD）。这两种方法都强调高精度，但在具体的程序细节和同位素分馏考虑上可能有所不同。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in data collection techniques for elemental analysis using XRF compared to stable isotope analysis using MC-ICPMS within the context of the Dabie orogen datasets?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在大别山造山带数据集的背景下，XRF（X射线荧光）和MC-ICPMS（多接收器电感耦合等离子体质谱）在元素分析和稳定同位素分析的数据收集技术上有什么区别？
Comparison.AnswerEn: XRF is used for major element analysis with a precision within 2%, focusing on bulk compositional data, whereas MC-ICPMS is used for stable isotope analysis with a precision better than 0.06‰, targeting isotopic ratios. The two methods cater to different analytical needs, with XRF providing elemental concentrations and MC-ICPMS offering detailed isotopic compositions.
Comparison.AnswerCn: XRF用于主要元素分析，精度在2%以内，侧重于整体成分数据，而MC-ICPMS用于稳定同位素分析，精度优于0.06‰，针对同位素比率。这两种方法满足不同的分析需求，XRF提供元素浓度，MC-ICPMS则提供详细的同位素组成。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What insights can be drawn from the variability in elemental isotopic data regarding the processes of crustal melting and magma differentiation in orogenic belts?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从元素同位素数据的变异性中可以得出关于造山带中地壳熔融和岩浆分异过程的哪些见解？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The variability in elemental isotopic data, such as Fe and Mg isotopes, can reveal information about isotopic fractionation during crustal melting and magma differentiation. For example, differences in δ56Fe values between leucosomes and melanosomes can indicate the fractionation behavior and bonding conditions in granitic melts and their residual mafic minerals. Similarly, the near-homogeneity of Mg isotopic compositions in low-Mg adakitic rocks suggests limited fractionation during partial melting of basaltic sources.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 元素同位素数据的变异性，例如铁（Fe）和镁（Mg）同位素，可以揭示地壳熔融和岩浆分异过程中的同位素分馏信息。例如，白色岩和黑色岩之间的δ56Fe值差异可以指示花岗岩熔体及其残留镁铁矿物中的分馏行为和结合条件。类似地，低镁阿达基岩石中镁同位素组成的近均匀性表明在基性源岩的部分熔融过程中分馏有限。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges in reconstructing source compositions for felsic igneous rocks can be inferred from the complexity of Fe isotope fractionation behavior?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从Fe同位素分馏行为的复杂性中可以推断出重建长英质火成岩源成分的哪些挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The challenges in reconstructing source compositions for felsic igneous rocks can be inferred from the complexity of Fe isotope fractionation behavior, which involves multiple processes like fractional crystallization and melt extraction. The difficulty lies in distinguishing the effects of source heterogeneity and parental magma compositions due to the overlapping influences of redox conditions and mineral coordination environments on Fe isotopic variations.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 重建酸性火成岩源成分的挑战可以从铁同位素分馏行为的复杂性中推断出来，这涉及多个过程，如分馏结晶和熔体提取。困难在于区分源异质性和母岩浆成分的影响，因为氧化还原条件和矿物配位环境对铁同位素变化的重叠影响。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the precision of isotopic measurements in datasets related to the Dabie orogen's migmatites and granitoids?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响与大别山造山带的混合岩和花岗岩相关的数据集中同位素测量精度的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The precision of isotopic measurements in the datasets related to the Dabie orogen's migmatites and granitoids is influenced by the use of high-resolution modes of MC-ICPMS, the standard-sample bracketing method, and thorough chromatographic purification processes. The precision is also maintained by conducting repeated measurements and considering both chemical procedures and isotopic measurement uncertainties.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 与大别山造山带的混合岩和花岗岩相关的数据集中的同位素测量精度受到高分辨率MC-ICPMS模式、标准-样品夹心法以及彻底的色谱纯化过程的影响。通过进行重复测量并考虑化学程序和同位素测量的不确定性，精度得以保持。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why are specific data collection methods, such as the use of XRF and ICP-MS, preferred for analyzing elemental and isotopic compositions in Dabie orogen's rock samples?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么在分析大别山岩石样品的元素和同位素组成时，特定的数据收集方法，如XRF和ICP-MS，受到青睐？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The use of XRF and ICP-MS is preferred for analyzing elemental and isotopic compositions in Dabie orogen's rock samples due to their high precision levels. XRF provides accuracy within 2% for major elements, while ICP-MS offers precision within 5% for trace elements. The MC-ICPMS further ensures precision better than 0.06‰ for metal stable isotopes, making these methods suitable for detailed geochemical analyses.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 由于其高精度，XRF和ICP-MS在分析大别山岩石样品的元素和同位素组成方面更受青睐。XRF对主要元素的准确度在2%以内，而ICP-MS对微量元素的精度在5%以内。MC-ICPMS进一步确保金属稳定同位素的精度优于0.06‰，使这些方法适合进行详细的地球化学分析。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the use of multiple isotopic measurement sequences impact the reliability of Mg and Fe isotopic data in geological studies?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 多重同位素测量序列的使用如何影响地质研究中镁和铁同位素数据的可靠性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of multiple isotopic measurement sequences can significantly enhance the reliability of Mg and Fe isotopic data by minimizing analytical uncertainties and improving accuracy. This can lead to more precise estimates of isotopic compositions and fractionation factors, aiding in the investigation of geological processes such as partial melting and magma differentiation.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用多重同位素测量序列可以显著提高镁和铁同位素数据的可靠性，减少分析不确定性并提高准确性。这可以导致同位素组成和分馏因子的更精确估计，有助于研究地质过程，如部分熔融和岩浆分异。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives behind collecting iron isotopic data from migmatites in the Dabie orogen to understand isotope fractionation during crustal anatexis?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集来自大别山造山带的混合岩的铁同位素数据，以理解地壳熔融过程中的同位素分馏，其背后的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to constrain isotope fractionation during crustal anatexis by reporting high precision Fe isotopic data for migmatites from the Dabie orogen, which helps in understanding the Fe isotopic variations related to processes such as fluid influx, crystallization, and mineral accumulation.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是通过报告来自大别山造山带的高精度铁同位素数据，限制地壳熔融过程中的同位素分馏，从而帮助理解与流体流入、结晶和矿物积累等过程相关的铁同位素变化。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to investigate the effect of source mineralogy on iron isotope fractionation during partial melting using adakitic rocks?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 研究源矿物学对部分熔融过程中铁同位素分馏的影响，特别是使用阿达基岩，是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Investigating the effect of source mineralogy on Fe isotope fractionation during partial melting of adakitic rocks helps to provide constraints on how different mineral compositions, especially garnet-bearing sources, affect isotope fractionation, offering insights into the redox conditions and magma differentiation processes.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 研究源矿物学对阿达基岩部分熔融过程中铁同位素分馏的影响，有助于提供不同矿物成分，特别是含石榴石的源对同位素分馏的影响的约束，从而为氧化还原条件和岩浆分异过程提供见解。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the goal of analyzing magnesium isotopic compositions in low-Mg adakitic rocks from the Dabie orogen?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 分析大别山造山带低镁阿达基岩中的镁同位素组成的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to investigate Mg isotope fractionation during partial melting of garnet-bearing sources, which can help in understanding the isotopic signatures of recycled supracrustal materials and the effects of residual garnet during the melting processes in thickened crust scenarios.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是研究在含石榴石源的部分熔融过程中镁同位素的分馏，这有助于理解回收的上地壳材料的同位素特征以及在增厚地壳情境下熔融过程中残留石榴石的影响。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the specific procedures used in the Isotope Geochemistry Lab to purify and measure Fe isotopes using MC-ICPMS?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在同位素地球化学实验室中，使用MC-ICPMS纯化和测量铁同位素的具体程序是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The Isotope Geochemistry Lab uses concentrated HF-HNO3-HCl-HClO4 to dissolve sample powders containing Fe, which is then purified using AG1X-8 resin in a HCl medium. The purified Fe is measured on a Neptune Plus MC-ICPMS using a sample-standard bracketing method, and the isotopic data are reported in traditional δ values relative to IRMM-014.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 同位素地球化学实验室使用浓缩的HF-HNO3-HCl-HClO4溶解含铁的样品粉末，然后在HCl介质中使用AG1X-8树脂进行纯化。纯化后的铁在Neptune Plus MC-ICPMS上使用样品-标准夹心法进行测量，测得的同位素数据以相对于IRMM-014的传统δ值报告。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How is Mg isotope analysis conducted to ensure accurate fractionation measurement in geological samples?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 镁同位素分析是如何进行的，以确保在地质样品中准确测量分馏？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Mg isotopic analyses are conducted by dissolving sample powders in a mixture of concentrated HF-HNO3, followed by refluxing with concentrated HCl-HNO3. The dissolved samples undergo purification using AG50W-X8 resin in a 1N HNO3 medium. Magnesium isotopic ratios are measured on a Neptune Plus MC-ICP-MS in low mass resolution mode by standard-sample bracketing.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 镁同位素分析通过将样品粉末溶解在浓HF-HNO3混合液中进行，随后用浓HCl-HNO3进行回流。溶解的样品在1N HNO3介质中使用AG50W-X8树脂进行纯化。镁同位素比率在低质量分辨率模式下通过标准-样品夹持法在Neptune Plus MC-ICP-MS上进行测量。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements have enabled the precise measurement of Fe isotope fractionation in igneous rocks?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得在火成岩中精确测量铁同位素分馏成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (MC-ICPMS) coupled with sample-standard bracketing has enabled the precise measurement of Fe isotope fractionation in igneous rocks, allowing for accuracy better than ±0.03‰ (2SD) as reported in the field.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 多收集器感应耦合等离子体质谱（MC-ICPMS）结合样品-标准夹层法的使用，使得在火成岩中精确测量铁同位素分馏成为可能，准确度优于±0.03‰（2SD），如该领域所报道。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the expected variations in Fe isotope fractionation during crustal melting be challenging to capture in a dataset?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在地壳熔融过程中，铁同位素分馏的预期变化可能在数据集中难以捕捉，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The challenge in capturing expected variations in Fe isotope fractionation during crustal melting lies in the difficulty of reconstructing the source property and parental magma compositions for felsic igneous rocks, considering the complexity of Fe isotope fractionation behavior during processes such as fractional crystallization after melt extraction.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在捕捉地壳熔融过程中铁同位素分馏的预期变化时，挑战在于重建长英质火成岩的源特性和母岩浆成分的困难，考虑到在熔体提取后，铁同位素分馏行为在分馏结晶等过程中复杂的特性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What reasons could account for the lack of significant Mg isotope fractionation observed in datasets of partial melting of garnet-bearing sources?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在含石榴石源的部分熔融数据集中观察到镁同位素分馏不显著的原因可能是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The lack of significant Mg isotope fractionation in datasets of partial melting of garnet-bearing sources may be due to the limited Mg isotope fractionation factor between the melt and clinopyroxene, which is suggested to be around −0.02‰, indicating that any isotope fractionation during partial melting is either insignificant or can be erased by melt-mantle interaction.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在含石榴石源的部分熔融数据集中，镁同位素分馏缺乏显著性可能是由于熔体与辉石之间的镁同位素分馏因子有限，建议约为−0.02‰，这表明在部分熔融过程中任何同位素分馏要么微不足道，要么可以被熔体-地幔相互作用所抹去。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do you evaluate the effectiveness of using X-ray fluorescence (XRF) and inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS) methods for data collection in the analysis of major and trace elements in geological samples?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用X射线荧光（XRF）和电感耦合等离子体质谱（ICP-MS）方法在地质样品中分析主要和微量元素的数据收集效果？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of X-ray fluorescence (XRF) for major element analysis and inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS) for trace elements in geological samples is highly effective due to their precision levels, with XRF having a precision within 2% and ICP-MS within 5%. These methods provide reliable and accurate data essential for understanding elemental compositions in geological research.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: X射线荧光（XRF）用于主要元素分析，感应耦合等离子体质谱（ICP-MS）用于微量元素分析在地质样品中非常有效，因为它们的精度水平，XRF的精度在2%以内，而ICP-MS在5%以内。这些方法提供可靠和准确的数据，对于理解地质研究中的元素组成至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the challenges associated with reconstructing the source property and parental magma compositions for felsic igneous rocks using current isotope fractionation methods?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 使用当前同位素分馏方法重建酸性火成岩的源属性和母岩浆成分面临的挑战是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Reconstructing the source property and parental magma compositions for felsic igneous rocks presents challenges mainly due to the complexity of iron isotope fractionation behavior. This complexity arises during processes such as fractional crystallization and melt extraction, making it difficult to accurately assess source properties.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 重建酸性火成岩的源特性和母岩浆成分面临挑战，主要是由于铁同位素分馏行为的复杂性。这种复杂性在分馏结晶和熔体提取等过程中出现，使得准确评估源特性变得困难。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the potential benefits of using multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (MC-ICPMS) for measuring metal stable isotopes in geological research?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在地质研究中，使用多收集器感应耦合等离子体质谱法（MC-ICPMS）测量金属稳定同位素的潜在好处是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (MC-ICPMS) for measuring metal stable isotopes offers significant benefits, including high precision, generally better than 0.06‰. This precision is crucial for accurately understanding metal stable isotope fractionation behaviors in magmatic systems, contributing valuable insights into geological processes.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 多收集器感应耦合等离子体质谱法（MC-ICPMS）用于测量金属稳定同位素具有显著优势，包括高精度，通常优于0.06‰。这种精度对于准确理解岩浆系统中的金属稳定同位素分馏行为至关重要，为地质过程提供了宝贵的见解。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about the challenges faced in reconstructing source properties and parental magma compositions for felsic igneous rocks.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对重建酸性火成岩的源特性和母岩浆成分所面临的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The challenges include the complexity of iron isotope fractionation behavior during processes like fractional crystallization after melt extraction and the difficulty in accurately reconstructing the original source properties and compositions of parental magmas.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 挑战包括在熔体提取后的分馏结晶等过程中铁同位素分馏行为的复杂性，以及准确重建母岩浆的原始源特性和成分的困难。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of the role different geological environments play in affecting Fe isotope fractionation during partial melting processes.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解不同地质环境在部分熔融过程中对铁同位素分馏的影响。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Geological environments, such as garnet-rich sources in eclogitic rocks, can lead to significant Fe isotope fractionation due to differences in source mineralogy. The environment plays a role in the extent of fractionation observed, with factors like redox conditions and coordination environment contributing to these variations.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 地质环境，如富含石榴石的榴辉岩源，可以由于源矿物的差异导致显著的铁同位素分馏。环境在观察到的分馏程度中起着重要作用，氧化还原条件和配位环境等因素会导致这些变化。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the data collection methods used for measuring metallic stable isotopes in the Dabie orogen and discuss the precision levels achieved through these techniques.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析用于测量大别山造山带金属稳定同位素的数据收集方法，并讨论通过这些技术实现的精度水平。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The data collection methods for measuring metallic stable isotopes in the Dabie orogen involved using multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (MC-ICPMS). The precision achieved for Ca, Mg, and Fe metallic stable isotopes was generally better than 0.06‰. This high precision was crucial for understanding the fractionation behavior of metallic stable isotopes in magmatic systems.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在大别山造山带中，测量金属稳定同位素的数据收集方法采用了多收集器电感耦合等离子体质谱法（MC-ICPMS）。对于钙、镁和铁金属稳定同位素，所达到的精度通常优于0.06‰。这种高精度对于理解岩浆系统中金属稳定同位素的分馏行为至关重要。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please provide an overview of the challenges faced in reconstructing the source properties and parental magma compositions for felsic igneous rocks, and how these challenges affect the understanding of isotopic fractionation.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 概述重建酸性火成岩的源特性和母岩浆成分所面临的挑战，以及这些挑战如何影响同位素分馏的理解。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges in reconstructing source properties and parental magma compositions for felsic igneous rocks include the complexity of iron isotope fractionation behavior during processes such as fractional crystallization after melt extraction. These challenges affect the understanding of isotopic fractionation by making it difficult to accurately trace the source and differentiation history of the rocks, thus complicating interpretations of isotopic variations.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 重建酸性火成岩的源特性和母岩浆成分面临的挑战包括在熔体提取后，分馏结晶等过程中铁同位素分馏行为的复杂性。这些挑战影响了对同位素分馏的理解，使得准确追踪岩石的源头和分异历史变得困难，从而使同位素变化的解释变得复杂。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify potential datasets that could be expanded or refined to improve understanding of isotope fractionation during partial melting and magma differentiation within the Dabie orogen.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请识别潜在的数据集，这些数据集可以扩展或细化，以提高对大别山造山带内部分熔融和岩浆分异过程中同位素分馏的理解。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential datasets for expansion or refinement include isotopic data from migmatites and adakitic rocks in the Dabie orogen. These datasets could be improved by increasing the number of samples analyzed, incorporating additional isotopic systems, or using more refined analytical techniques to enhance the understanding of isotope fractionation during partial melting and magma differentiation.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 潜在的扩展或细化数据集包括来自大别山造山带的混合岩和阿达基岩的同位素数据。这些数据集可以通过增加分析样本的数量、结合其他同位素系统或使用更精细的分析技术来提高，从而增强对部分熔融和岩浆分异过程中同位素分馏的理解。
